item.title: Adding orange/green custom right click box
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:6, topic:302878"]sure ill try to give you a quick guide

ok this 0xF0820C is a colour code which is found in the big code in the tut. this colour is orange. there is tons of colours and you just gota get the code for the colour you want. but most are like this F0820C if its like that just add the 0x before the code and swap your colour for the colours in mine. once you find out which colours change what [which took me around 15 mins] its just you decideding what colours you want. i hope this helps but its not really a good guide. ill try to make a tut on this with a basic colour code list :)[/quote]

Thanks, ~icestorm~ .

Read full topic
item.source: Adding orange/green custom right click box

item.title: Adding orange/green custom right click box

@_icestorm wrote:

sure ill try to give you a quick guide

ok this 0xF0820C is a colour code which is found in the big code in the tut. this colour is orange. there is tons of colours and you just gota get the code for the colour you want. but most are like this F0820C if its like that just add the 0x before the code and swap your colour for the colours in mine. once you find out which colours change what [which took me around 15 mins] its just you decideding what colours you want. i hope this helps but its not really a good guide. ill try to make a tut on this with a basic colour code list

item.title: Adding orange/green custom right click box
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[center]Note:This is my first tut iv ever made so please tell me how i did and what i can do to improve
Difficulty Levels:
first time codeing-5/10
newer coder-3/10
medium coder-1/10
expert coder-0/10

Server-Side Or Client Side-Client Side

Classes Modifyed-Client.Java

Credits:
-1% JaGeX
-39% Me For me changing colours and posting this.
-60% Tonic for making the first tut.

Ok so lets get this started.

~Step 1~
Open Client.Java and hit ctrl+f,Then search public final void method40(byte byte0)

~Step 2~
Delete everything thats there including public final void method40(byte byte0)until you reach public final void method41(byte byte0, long l) [Do not delete] public final void method41(byte byte0, long l)

~Step 3~
In the spot thatpublic final void method40(byte byte0)used to be add this.[/center] [code]public final void method40(byte byte0) {
int yPos = anInt950; int xPos = anInt949;
int menuWidth = anInt951;
int menuHeight = anInt952;
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + 1, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 2, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 2, yPos + 2, xPos, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 4, yPos + 3, xPos + 1, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 2, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + 3, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 2, xPos + 3, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 3, xPos + 3, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 4, xPos + 3, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 5, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 6, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 7, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 8, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 9, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 10, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 11, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 12, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 13, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 14, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 15, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 16, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 17, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 2, xPos + 1, 0x2BF00C, 2, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 1, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0x2BF00C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + 2, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0xF0820C, 2, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 21, yPos + 19, xPos + 2, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 4, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(menuHeight - 23, yPos + 20, xPos + 3, 0xF0820C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos, 0x2BF00C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos, 0xF0820C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos + 1, 0x2BF00C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + 1, 0xF0820C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos + 1, 0x2BF00C, 2, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + 2, 0xF0820C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos + menuWidth - 1, 0x2BF00C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos + menuWidth - 1, 0xF0820C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 1, xPos + menuWidth - 2, 0x2BF00C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + menuWidth - 2, 0xF0820C, 1, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 2, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0xF0820C, 2, 1);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(1, yPos + menuHeight - 3, xPos + menuWidth - 3, 0x2BF00C, 1, 1);

int mouseX = super.anInt20;
int mouseY = super.anInt21;
if (anInt948 == 0) {
mouseX -= 4;
mouseY -= 4;
} else if (anInt948 == 1) {
mouseX -= 553;
mouseY -= 205;
} else if (anInt948 == 2) {
mouseX -= 17;
mouseY -= 357;
}
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(true, true, xPos + 3, 0x2BF00C, “Choose Option”, yPos + 14);
for (int l1 = 0; l1 < anInt1133; l1++) {
int textY = yPos + 31 + (anInt1133 - 1 - l1) * 15;
if(aStringArray1199[l1] == null)
return;
int textColor = 0x2BF00C;
if (mouseX > xPos && mouseX < xPos + menuWidth && mouseY > textY - 11 && mouseY < textY + 5) {
if(aStringArray1199[l1].equalsIgnoreCase(“Cancel”))
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(12, textY - 9, xPos + 3, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
else
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(16, textY - 10, xPos + 3, 0x2BF00C, menuWidth - 6, 1);
textColor = 0x2BF00C;
}
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(true, true, xPos + 3, textColor, aStringArray1199[l1], textY + 2);
}
}
[/code] And paste it in the spot i just told you.

~Step 4~
Close your client [if open] and save the client.java,then compile your client and run it again.

In The End It Will Look Like This
